title: Post Game: "Living in different realities"
description: Marianna Sotomayor, Washington Post Congressional Reporter, joins Chuck to talk about the devastation caused by tornado damage across six states, and Sen. Roger Marshall's (R-Kan.) views on the 2020 election result.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
